articles.title: Chonburi Beats Saipa at Asian Women's Club Volleyball C’ship - Tasnim News Agency
articles.description: TEHRAN (Tasnim) – Thailand’s Supreme Chonburi defeated Saipa of Iran 3-1 (25-23, 22-25, 25-13, 25-13) at the 2021 Asian Women's Club Volleyball Championship Pool B on Friday.
articles.content:
Saipa will play Kazakhstans Altay and Rebisco Philippines on the following days.
Nakhon Ratchasima QminC of Thailand, Zhetysu of Kazakhstan and Philippines Choco Mucho are in Pool A.
